RESTRICT.ERROR_CONNECTION_NOT_ALLOWED_NOW: The connection is not available at this time.
RESTRICT.ERROR_CONNECTION_NOT_ALLOWED_FROM_HOST: The connection is not allowed from this host.
RESTRICT.ERROR_USER_LOGIN_NOT_ALLOWED_NOW: The login for this user is not allowed at this time.
RESTRICT.ERROR_USER_LOGIN_NOT_ALLOWED_FROM_HOST: The login for this user is not allowed from this host.
